=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CONBOLA Make Up Organizer 5 in 1 Dresser Organizer,Portable for Lipstick and Jewlry ,Makeup Organizer and Temporary Makeup Brush Holder,Multi-purpose for Girl Women.36.6cm18cm.(Blue)
Review Date: 2020/12/29
Store: CONBOLA
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Silicone', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Color': 'Blue', 'Brand': 'CONBOLA', 'Mounting Type': 'Tabletop Mount', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '15.08 x 7.44 x 1.5 inches; 1.65 Pounds', 'UPC': '750226660013'}
Review Text: This is great for minimalists or teenagers. Keeps your essentials organized. you can keep makeup brushes and a few cosmetics in it. It also keeps jewelry, hair ties and other small items organized and easy to find. The mirror is removable as well. Very nice size, and can easily be wiped clean when needed. made of a thick plastic, and the holder slots are silicone. The mirror is a glass mirror. Overall, highly recommended.
Review Title: Great for minimalists
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[miclan] Honey Black Rice Moisturizing Mask 10pcs - Mediheal Family Brand Facial Sheet Mask Full of Moisturizing Revitalize Skin with Black Rice and Honey
miclan
{'Package Dimensions': '8.07 x 4.41 x 1.54 inches; 11.99 Ounces'}
These are real Korean face masks from a great brand. I first discovered this brand from a subscription box and am now hooked. The box contains 10 masks and each are individually wrapped. They have a generous amount of serum in each. Great as a weekend treat at home after a bath. Overall, highly recommended!
Great face masks!
Travel Bottles Keychain, 1.7oz/50ml Portable Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Fine Mist Spray Keychain Bottles, Empty Leakproof Refillable Containers with Flip/Spray Cap Plastic Travel Bottles (5PC)
XITENBAO
{'Brand': 'XITENBAO', 'Material': 'Silicone,Plastic', 'Capacity': '50 Milliliters, 1.7 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Mist Spray, Leakproof', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 7 x 2.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'klp-001', 'UPC': '192408404112'}
I use this to fill with rubbing alcohol to use as hand sanitizer. I clip it to my bag and use the sprayer to disinfect shopping carts as well. Super handy. They sprayer works very well and does not get clogged. Overall, highly recommended. Have filled all of them and given them to family members to utilize as well.
Perfect for hand sanitizer
Lnlofen 2Pcs Hollow Woven Headband with Clips, Fashion Braided Headbands Double Layer Twist Plait Headband Hair Tools, Double Bangs Hairstyle Hairpin for Women Girls (Brown & Black)
Lnlofen
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Resin', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'Lnlofen', 'Size': '2 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 7.83 x 0.59 inches; 1.34 Ounces', 'UPC': '768894803793'}
This makes hair styling very easy. Looks professional, and comfortable for all day wear. The band itself is kinda fragile so you have to be careful not to bend it too far apart or it might snap. Overall, it's a good product.
Easy hair styling accessory
PINROSE Perfumes Bold Soul - Eau de Parfum Petals (Fragrance Towelettes) - Vegan, Cruelty-free, and Hypoallergenic Scent with Essential Oils - Notes of Crushed Blackberry, Tuberose, Vanilla, Cinnamon and Patchouli
PINROSE
{'Brand': 'PINROSE', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Scent': 'Bold Soul', 'Special Feature': 'Portable', 'Fragrance Concentration': 'eau_de_parfum', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 0.05 inches; 0.49 Ounces', 'UPC': '850016075529'}
These are perfect for on the go and travel. Don't leak and the pads are nicely saturated. Great to keep in makeup bags or even as a stocking stuffer. I don't use perfume everyday, so these last me a while. Nice way to try out a fragrance before committing to a full sized bottle as well. Highly recommended.
Super convenient, great for travel.
MIZON Real Vitamin C Ampoule, Pure Vitamin C, No Water Added,10 Ingredients, Tone correction treatment, Nutrition, Face Moisturizer (1.01 fl oz)
MIZON
{'Brand': 'MIZON', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin C', 'Unit Count': '1.01 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 2.7 x 1.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I use this at night time as a serum before moisturizer. It smells wonderfully first if all. The texture is very thin and lightweight. It sinks into skin quickly. I do recommend wearing sunscreen during the day time as it can make your newer skin photosensitive. Overall, it's a very easy way to apply vitamin C to brighten skin and even skin tone.
Great for brightening the skin
Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Keiby Citom
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
These are very good nail files. They work very well, and lasts through multiple uses. I have natural nails, and I I find that the two different grits work well with smoothing edges and removing sharp corners of nails after trimming. I was replacing my old files after every use and the sand was flaking off and getting all over my floors. I did not have any problems with these doing that. Overall, it's a very high quality product and I would highly recommend it, especially for professional use.
Great nail files

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has consistently prioritized high-quality facial masks with moisturizing properties influenced by Korean skincare trends. They have recently expanded their interests to include potent skincare serums for brightening and improving skin tone. Their acquisition of versatile nail care tools reflects an emerging interest in manicure products that enhance overall grooming practices. Additionally, they have shown an inclination towards organization products that streamline beauty routines.

- **Brand Loyalty:** While remaining loyal to reputable skincare brands, the user is willing to explore innovative beauty products across various categories, including nails and storage solutions, enhancing their overall beauty experience.

- **Usage Context:** The user values products that seamlessly integrate into their self-care practices, prioritizing both relaxation and convenience. Their recent experiences with effective serums, nail tools, and organizational products contribute to a commitment to enriching skincare and grooming rituals.

- **Product Characteristics:** The user appreciates high-performance products characterized by effective design and usability. Their satisfaction with durable grooming and organizational tools demonstrates a preference for items that deliver results without compromising quality.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user's consistent high ratings across diverse product categories illustrate a strong commitment to quality and functionality in their purchases. They enjoy tools that provide tangible benefits, enriching their routines while maintaining a focus on practicality.

Overall, the user seeks effective self-care experiences that harmonize convenience, luxury, and practicality across skincare, haircare, nails, and beauty organization, reflecting an evolving collection tailored to their lifestyle needs.
